Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Delicious burgers! I got the chicken avo burger and they serve it with almost half an avocado! Amazing stuff. It comes with a side of probably the best sweet potato fries I've ever tried in my whole life. Their sauces also make any dish even more delectable.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Amazing sweet potato fries. Burger was good but nothing special. Atmosphere isnt great but the waitress was pleasant.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Very tasty burgers and fries, portions are large. Price for burger and fries about 12 euros.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text:
My favorite burger so far. It tasted great! The price was fine. Not cheap, but not too expensive either.
Only complaint would be about their choice of music. ‚Ä¶

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Ok the staff are great, I dropped by here for dinner on a Monday night and there was jazz tunes playing in the background making for a wonderful atmosphere. I ended up ordering the beef Burger with goats cheese, bacon and sweet potato ‚Ä¶

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Let's start with the good stuff: The sides, corn on the cob, grilled veggies, wedges and especially the sweet potato fries were great! ‚Ä¶

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Mother of God, this place knows how to make a bangin burger.  The chips are exquisite crispy pillows of pure love.  The only criticism we have is with the bun.  It is way too big and stodgy.  I ended up having to do the unspeakable and pick it apart like a heathen.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text:
Great Place, Great Service, Great Food, Great Music, Great Experience!!

Popped in before we went to the cimema one night just to see what  the new ‚Ä¶

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Best sweet potato fries in the city, even for take out. Super friendly staff. Lamb burger was good but a little dry.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Delicious burgers in good prices! Really loved that there is a lot of unique combinations and vegetarian options in the menu.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Best hamburgers in town! I was there during the opening week, took a while before the food was ready, but absolutely worth waiting for, also friendly staff

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Great selection of burgers, very clean, good selection of music.  Highly recommend the James Brown burger and sweet potato fries.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Great food, very nice atmosphere and amazing staff

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Excellent burger, tasteful fries, and very friendly staff!

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Extremly helpful service, nice place with well-designed interior and genius loci. Burger was just fine.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text: Great choice of make your own burger combinations and great friendly staff.  Definitely one of my favourites.

Name: Soulburger
Review Text:
The combination of an expensive and not very tasty burger and the looks of the place is the sum of the two star result.

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Restaurant specializing in hamburgers where everyone can find happiness! With a sauce and homemade fries we are having a great time! I remove 1 star because the establishment does not offer a dessert just coffee :) ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Ordered via Uber, salad with advocado was very bad brown bah !, burger reasonable he was very dry and cold, sweet potato fries were cold. So don't order via Uber! ‚Ä¶
